forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 7C. WSW winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 48F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Partial clearing late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
